body.name: Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Shampoo to Moisturize Dry Scalp & Hair, with Tea Tree Oil, pH-Balanced, Paraben-Free & Phthalate-Free, Safe for Color-Treated Hair, 12oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 23 mins
features: Sooth and Moisturize hair from root to tip with Neutrogena Healthy Scalp Soothe and Calm Shampoo and Conditioner
Ideal for Dry, Uncomfortable Scalp and Hair: Our soothing shampoo and conditioner help calm dry scalp and cleanse strands
Formulated with Tea Tree Oil: A natural conditioning agent that helps refresh and revive the scalp
Gentle, Non Medicated Shampoo and Conditioner: Free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS and SLES
Helps Maintain Scalp's Natural Barrier: This nourishing pH balanced shampoo and conditioner help maintain scalp's natural barrier with regular use
body.description: Soothe and moisturize hair from root to tip with our calming scalp shampoo with tea tree oil. It helps reduce feelings of discomfort while also refreshing and reviving a sensitive scalp. Ideal for dry, uncomfortable scalp and hair, it's suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,423 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #62 in Hair Shampoo

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Healthy Scalp Clarify and Shine Shampoo with Pink Grapefruit exfoliates and cleanses hair and scalp in one simple step. Made especially for oily hair and scalp but suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair, this clarifying shampoo helps gently exfoliate residue and build-up, promoting a more healthy scalp and hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more itchy scalp, no more build up on my hair and scalp.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because my scalp felt a little itchy but, I've never actually had dandruff. Also, my hair was sort of limp and never felt clean.I think I had a massive build up of other hair products just weighing down my hair.I HATE the smell of tea tree oil, but I took a chance on this product anyway.The smell is light and just smells clean.After washing my hair, I decided not to condition it, just using the Neutrogena product.My hair felt so soft and clean! The tangles and damage we much better.It moisturize my hair enough that it was easy to comb thru.When my hair dried, it was so soft and felt clean for the first time in a long time!My hair feels light again, some of the curl in my hair is back!No itchiness.I'm hooked on this product and just can't say enough good things about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is AMAZING! Hands down, my favorite shampoo and conditioner. It smells so, so good and makes my hair feel amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Why does this work better than Head and Shoulder and other so called Dry Scalp Relief Products?
reviews.reviewText: Something is up. Its been years and years or trial and error and my dry scalp was embarrassing and humiliating. This is the only product that works for me. What I did was check in on my scalp and I noticed every four days after washing the flakes would return. It went from severe flakes to smaller flakes but intense itching SMH. But now with this product, after four days its practically nothing on my shoulders. I do have to take a star off bc although my scalp isnt intensely itchy, it does itch. When it starts itching, I use Jamaican Mango and Like mentholated No More Itch spray for soothing. My scalp is definitely clean and smells fresh. I used another tea tree shampoo that claimed to soothe and stop dry scalp but for some reason it failed! Not sure if its me or if these products are on some BS bit Neutrogena is closer to the truth. A+!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell is great 👍
reviews.reviewText: Like the smell . Hair smells and feels great after using !!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing and refreshing
reviews.reviewText: This beautiful product is soothing and refreshing. It smells so good! A little goes a Long way. Wet your hair first. You will love the whole experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is expensive shampoo. It's a small bottle. I felt itchy, but it didn't help with that. I don't like the feel of my hair when I use it either. I wouldn't buy it again. Overall, disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves hair exceptionally soft but without much body. Probably because it has no conditioner. I really like the product, but the fragrance is a little strange. To me it smells like chocolate mint. Chocolate?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Gentle Oasis for Your Hair Care Routine
reviews.reviewText: The Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine, and I am thoroughly impressed with its ability to provide a soothing and refreshing experience for both my hair and scalp.The standout feature of this shampoo is its calming effect on the scalp. From the moment it lathers, a gentle and cooling sensation envelops my scalp, creating a spa-like experience in the comfort of my own shower. This is especially beneficial for those moments when I need to unwind and de-stress.The formula is gentle yet effective, and I appreciate that it's suitable for daily use. It cleanses my hair without stripping it of essential oils, leaving it feeling fresh, revitalized, and not overly dry. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall health of my scalp since incorporating this shampoo into my routine.The fragrance is subtle and pleasing, adding to the overall calming experience. It's not overpowering, making it suitable for those with sensitivity to strong scents. The fragrance also lingers on the hair, providing a subtle and pleasant aroma throughout the day.As with other Neutrogena products, the dermatologist-tested formula gives me confidence in the product's safety and effectiveness. It's free from harsh chemicals, making it a suitable choice for individuals with sensitive skin or scalp concerns.The packaging is practical, and the flip-top cap makes dispensing the product easy and mess-free. A little goes a long way, making this shampoo a cost-effective option without compromising on quality.In conclusion, the Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Shampoo is a standout product in the realm of hair care. It not only cleanses effectively but also provides a calming and refreshing experience for the scalp. If you're looking for a shampoo that goes beyond the basics to nurture your hair and scalp, this product is a fantastic choice. I highly recommend it for anyone seeking a gentle and soothing addition to their hair care routine. My only issue is the price per bottle which may seem a little on the pricier end.
El producto es muy bueno e inmediatamente me quitó la comezón en el cuero cabelludo. La presentación viene diferente.

The odour and feel of the shampoo is OK; however, it falls short of the Neutrogena 'T-Gel Daily Control' shampoo that has been discontinued. My scalp is now dryer and itchy, whereas I did not experience this with the 'T-Gel Daily Control', which I had been using for quite a few years successfully.
Me gusto, deja el cabello muy suave.

Es buenísimo para la resequedad, tenía tanta incomodidad, que para aliviar la sensacion de sequedad extrema, me ponía aceite de argan como para querer hidratar.Al segundo día de usuar este shampoo el problema se acabó, si huele bonito pero se va pronto el aroma, deja el cabello con aspecto sano, tampoco esperen maravillas, aquí lo realmente importante es que acaba rápido con la sequedad capilar.Lo amo! Cambio de presentación a un empaque color opaco, como que no esta bonito como la versión anterior pero el contenido es lo que vale ♥️
